name: Caves of Plague
description:
The plague enveloped this world making mysterious monsters left their caves and conquered the human dwellings. The living dead had risen from the graves, and the common people shuddered in a threat. Only you, a cold-blooded plague doctor, can stop this madness! Start your refractory soul reaping with Caves of Plague – complete fascinating missions, fight the black magic itself and save this world! Explore the great number of stunning locations, exterminate the evil spirits, power your hero up and search for an amazing loot. Forget about the mercy – thus the plague will swallow the world at large! Get ready for the traps and strange puzzles, ‘cause the evil doesn’t slumber: its name is legion!

Features:

Plague doctor quest in really troubled times
Dozens of dangerous enemies (dead and alive)
Memorable gameplay with a little madness drop
A chance to power your equipment and stats up
Useful potions and interesting weapons
Win a victory over the plaque and become a real hero!

Dip into the atmosphere of Caves of Plague – defeat the darkness itself!
